isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - SPEEDOMETER/TACHOMETER, GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 9800 - Troubleshooting - TESTING VEHICLE SPEED SIGNAL TO ECM AND DATA LINK CIRCUITS BETWEEN THE SPEEDOMETER/TACHOMETER MODULE TO THE ECM

svcproc.title: TESTING VEHICLE SPEED SIGNAL TO ECM AND DATA LINK CIRCUITS BETWEEN THE SPEEDOMETER/TACHOMETER MODULE TO THE ECM
svcproc.para: To test VSS circuits to the ECM and data link circuits between the Speedometer/Tachometer module to the ECM, refer to S08154/CTS-5257 in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
